name: Framed_Image_v1.0
author: Valiant
description: Renders a customizable framed image using box primitives for the frame, with configurable rim thickness, depth, color, emissive glow, backboard, and a disco mode that animates hue-cycling on frame or backboard. Spawns box colliders in multiple modes and supports transparent image panels with shadow
